content: crochet pattern for the super cute strawberry pal in amigurumi - aka plushie it is an instant pdf download - not a physical item this is a no sew project the only time you will need your yarn needle is to make the face it is all made in one piece this super squishy friend is fun to make and works up quick it takes less than an hour you should already know how to crochet the stitches listed below before buying this pattern this was tested by my amazing team size 3 inches difficulty easy but not meant as your first amigurumi make sure you know the stitches stitches us sl single_crochet increase decrease blo flo automatic download for pdf document this top quality pattern is 5 pages 3 if you print double sided and guides you along with plenty of pictures and tips suggested yarn this is what i used but don t be afraid to do your own version i used red heart super saver rhss for the face details and just chenille yarn for the body which can be found at dollar tree black 1 yard rhss black white 1 yard rhss white pink 12 yards just chenille pink green 4 yards just chenille lime yardage can vary by person and gauge these are estimates based on my own use it is always good to have a little extra just in case you will also need sizes f 3 75 crochet hook yarn needle stuffing stitch markers pink permanent fabric marker i like the tulip brand looking for free giveaways coupons and more fun come join our club https //www facebook com/groups/210475173897335 i m on instagram too @brilliantbuttoncrochet if you have any questions or need help please contact me i love to help you may of course sell your final product but please use your own pictures
